name: Strawberries Glaze Pie
author: Shirley Drury
instructions: Take 1 cup of smallest berries and 1 cup water and cook slowly until berries are soft. Strain, mix together sugar and cornstarch. Add to juice and cook until clear and thick. Cool. Add powdered sugar to 3 cups large berries. Let stand for one hour. Spread 1 small package cream cheese in bottom of pie shell. Next arrange large berries in shell, topping with the cooled liquid. Chill in refrigerator. Serve with whipped cream or ice cream.
